snippet: Malaysia on Saturday rejected any suggestion it may have violated sanctions imposed by the United Nations on North Korea, after a Reuters report said North Korea-linked firms were running an arms network in the country....

headline.main: China to Strengthen Defenses, No Word on Budget
headline.print_headline: China to Strengthen Defenses, No Word on Budget

lead_paragraph: Malaysia on Saturday rejected any suggestion it may have violated sanctions imposed by the United Nations on North Korea, after a Reuters report said North Korea-linked firms were running an arms network in the country.
